BATTERIES.HYB_BM_CHARGEFROMAC: from oth­er gen­er­at­ors in the home net­work
BATTERIES.HYB_EVU_CHARGEFROMGRID: from oth­er gen­er­at­ors in the home net­work and from pub­lic grid
BATTERIES.supportSocActive: Al­low bat­tery sup­port for Ohm­pilot Eco

EXPORTLIMIT.LIMIT_INFO: The in­ver­t­er switches off, when the set ex­port lim­it pro­tec­tion value is ex­ceeded.
EXPORTLIMIT.PHASE_INFO: Smart met­er & in­ver­t­er phase align­ment (L1, L2, L3) must match!

PHASE_MODE.NO_LIMIT_ENABLED_ERROR: Soft and / or Hard Lim­it must be ac­tiv­ated.
PHASE_MODE.asymmetricFeedInError: "Lim­it mul­tiple in­verters" has to be turned off for asym­met­ric gen­er­a­tion lim­it.

EXPORTLIMIT.WLIM_MAX_FEEDIN_HARD: Max­imum grid feed-in power (Hard Lim­it Trip)
EXPORTLIMIT.WLIM_MAX_FEEDIN_PER_PHASE: Max­imum grid feed-in power per phase
EXPORTLIMIT.WLIM_MAX_FEEDIN_PER_PHASE_HARD: Max­imum grid feed-in power per phase (Hard Lim­it Trip)
EXPORTLIMIT.WLIM_MAX_FEEDIN_PER_PHASE_SOFT: Max­imum grid feed-in power per phase (Soft Lim­it)
EXPORTLIMIT.WLIM_MAX_FEEDIN_SOFT: Max­imum grid feed-in power (Soft Lim­it Trip)
EXPORTLIMIT.WLIM_MAX_W: Max­imum Per­miss­ible Ex­port Power of En­tire Sys­tem
EXPORTLIMIT.WLIM_MAX_W_HARD: Max­imum Per­miss­ible Ex­port Power of En­tire Sys­tem (Hard Lim­it Trip)
EXPORTLIMIT.WLIM_MAX_W_SOFT: Max­imum Per­miss­ible Ex­port Power of En­tire Sys­tem (Soft Lim­it)
EXPORTLIMIT.WPEAK: Total DC power of the En­tire Sys­tem
EXPORTLIMIT.failSafeModeEnabled: Re­duce in­ver­t­er power to 0% if met­er con­nec­tion has been lost.

IOMAPPING.SYSTEM_PRESERVATION_CHANGE: Min­im­um lim­it for back­up re­serve ca­pa­city and SOC-Warn­ing Level was set to {{limit}}%.
IOMAPPING.SYSTEM_PRESERVATION_NO_CHANGE: The cur­rent set­ting is already above the cal­cu­lated lim­it of {{limit}}%.

additionalPurposeAgreement.analyticalData: Trans­fer us­age data and ser­vice data for fur­ther ana­lysis to im­prove our ser­vices
additionalPurposeAgreement.analyticalDataDetails: I con­sent to the {{analyticalDataLink}} con­cern­ing my Froni­us device to or by FRONI­US IN­TER­NA­TION­AL GmbH for the pur­poses of product im­prove­ment and op­tim­iz­a­tion as well as fault dia­gnosis and elim­in­a­tion. My con­sent can be de­ac­tiv­ated loc­ally on the device at any time in the Com­mis­sion­ing Wiz­ard and Com­mu­nic­a­tion/Sol­ar.web menus. The law­ful­ness of the pro­cessing based on the con­sent re­mains un­af­fected un­til re­voc­a­tion.
additionalPurposeAgreement.analyticalDataLink: op­tion­al peri­od­ic pro­vi­sion, col­lec­tion and ana­lysis of dia­gnost­ic and us­age data
additionalPurposeAgreement.motivationExamples:
Ex­amples of provided data:
  • Op­er­at­ing and device data:
    These are, for ex­ample, loc­a­tion data, per­form­ance data, device con­fig­ur­a­tions or data about the plant status.
  • Up­load sys­tem logs:
    The sys­tem logs of the ser­vices run­ning on the device can be up­loaded to a log serv­er at Froni­us. There they are avail­able to our de­velopers for fur­ther ana­lysis. With the help of this data, rarely oc­cur­ring but po­ten­tially ser­i­ous prob­lems can be found and remedied more quickly.
  • Ac­tivat­able per­form­ance mon­it­or­ing and re­porting:
    Pro­cessor load and memory us­age can be mon­itored over longer peri­ods of time. This in­form­a­tion helps us to better un­der­stand pro­cessor and memory util­iz­a­tion and to and to be able to car­ry out op­tim­iz­a­tions.
additionalPurposeAgreement.motivationText:
We ask our cus­tom­ers to help us by provid­ing ana­lyt­ics, dia­gnostics and us­age data. By agree­ing to the pro­cessing of this data, you help us dia­gnose and resolve un­ex­pec­ted sys­tem er­rors. By doing so, you also help us to fur­ther im­prove and op­tim­ize our pro­ducts and ser­vices. We reg­u­larly col­lect and eval­u­ate the data provided for these pur­poses.

Con­sent to the pro­cessing of ana­lysis, dia­gnost­ic and us­age data is op­tion­al. If you do not con­sent to this data pro­cessing, it will not af­fect our con­trac­tu­al per­form­ance ob­lig­a­tions or an ex­isting con­nec­tion between your device and Froni­us Sol­ar.web.

approvalStatus.ACCEPTED: Yes, I agree with this tech­nic­ally ne­ces­sary data pro­cessing.
approvalStatus.AcceptedSolarWeb: Yes, I agree with this tech­nic­ally ne­ces­sary data pro­cessing.
approvalStatus.DECLINED: No, I do not agree with the data pro­cessing and re­ject it.
approvalStatus.DeclinedSolarWeb: No, I do not agree with the data pro­cessing and re­ject it.

SOLARWEB.customerRemoteControlProfileActive: Al­low cloud con­trol for Vir­tu­al Power Plants (Cus­tom­er)
SOLARWEB.enableRemoteControl: Al­low cloud con­trol for net­work op­er­ator/en­er­gy sup­plier
SOLARWEB.technicianRemoteControlProfileActive: Al­low cloud con­trol for reg­u­lat­ory pur­poses (Tech­ni­cian)
